description: I've a dual monitor setup, brightness and contrast works.

I used this tool to adjust my external screens' brightness and contrast. It works OK on my HDMI and DP connected Dell screens, even though it shows a message that the screens are unknown and require clicking "OK" to dismiss it - everytime I choose a screen (not even one time per launch - every time I switch screens).

It doesn't support my laptop's built in screen (which is OK for me because I have hardware controls for that). Aside from that and the annoyting "screen is not in the database" error you get for any screens newer than 10 years old, the main con for this application is that it looks very archaic - it is very minimal and would not look out of place on your 90s FVWM linux desktop.
summary: Works OK for most uses, not modern

description: I've been dreaming with that for a long time. Thanks devs!
no GUI. launcher won't work. must open gui through terminal. gddcontrol command
Lets me control the brightness on my monitor without having to reach out for the buttons. Does the job just like you expect. Well done
This app is really very useful. It can directly control the settings of my display unlike other apps which just simulates those settings.

just need
-auto switching profile (on time base)
-saturation
No monitor supporting DDC/CI available.
However the interface looks outdated, and not modern at all. Maybe make it look nicer! Other than that, works perfectly on my Cintiq pro 16
Excellent no changes needed
summary: Easily Control the brightness of monitor

description: App doesn't recognize my this old PC but the brightness works perfect. None of the other apps turned up the brightness.
summary: Runs great on my 2014 Dell all-in-one

description: works fine with my monitor loved it
App works well with Dell U2412M and HP Folio 1040 G1 via DP.
While a specific profile was not found, the default generic profile works on Focal 20.04 LTS with Samsung Monitor. Handy tool!
summary: Works on 20.04 LTS with Samsung Monitor on VGA

description: Upon boot, DDC Control states that there is not support for my monitor in the database, yet it works fine regardless. Thanks for the great program!
summary: Works well for Dell UltraSharp U2720Q 27 Inch 4K UHD

description: Not Working "Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish)" don't waste your time to download this.

Great app, worked out of the box while brightness-controller (apt) did not. My monitor is not referenced yet in the app's database, but the generic profile does the job! Kudos to the development team.
summary: Works great - Ubuntu 22.04 and Dell S3423DWC

description: es lenta en cargar y no permite ajustar el brillo de manera rapida, pero funciona y se agradece
Funciona muy bien para manipular los controles de uno o más monitores sin tener que tocar sus botones.
Aunque mi monitor no aparece en la base de datos, pude controlar perfectamente el brillo, ¡muchas gracias!
nul...ne démarre même pas
Ne démarre pas!
